items.name: Anna
items.text: Super friendly team and the gear felt almost new. Quick fitting and clear prices.

items.name: David
items.text: Booked for the whole family — everything was ready on time. Great experience.

items.name: Li Wei
items.text: Premium set was excellent. Staff helped with sizing and gave good tips.

items.name: Dmitry
items.text: Very удобное место и приятный персонал. Всё быстро и без лишних вопросов.

items.name: Mariam
items.text: Private lesson was super helpful. Progress in one day!

items.name: Aruzhan
items.text: Good quality service, beautiful shop, and easy booking flow.
